actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A resolution to urge the House of Representatives to reject any tax reform proposal which would impose a tax on the annual increase in the value of permanent life insurance.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that any tax reform legislation should not impose a tax on the annual increase in the value of permanent life insurance.

titles.title: A resolution to urge the House of Representatives to reject any tax reform proposal which would impose a tax on the annual increase in the value of permanent life insurance.
